description: Create a new MLS conversation with optional initial members, metadata, and invite link (consolidates createConvo + createInvite + revokeInvite)

main.description: Create a new MLS conversation. Optionally adds initial members with a Welcome message and creates an invite link in one atomic operation.

cipherSuite.description: MLS cipher suite to use for this conversation

initialMembers.description: DIDs of initial members to add (max 999 excluding creator)

welcomeMessage.description: Base64url-encoded MLS Welcome message for ALL initial members

keyPackageHashes.description: Array of {did, hash} objects mapping each initial member to their key package hash

invite.description: Optional invite link management: create or revoke invite codes at conversation creation time

currentEpoch.description: Client's current MLS epoch after group creation (for server telemetry only)

inviteCode.description: Generated invite code (only present if invite.action was 'create')

sequencerDs.description: DID of the delivery service acting as sequencer for this conversation

errors.name: InvalidCipherSuite
errors.description: The specified cipher suite is not supported

errors.name: KeyPackageNotFound
errors.description: Key package not found for one or more initial members

errors.name: MutualBlockDetected
errors.description: Cannot create conversation with users who have blocked each other

hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the key package used

action.description: Action to perform: 'create' generates a new invite code, 'revoke' invalidates an existing code

code.description: Invite code to revoke (required when action is 'revoke')
